code: import{createActions,createAction}from'redux-actions';export var getType=function getType(reduxActions){return reduxActions().type;};export var getPosts=createActions({getPostsRequest:undefined,getPostsSuccess:function getPostsSuccess(payload){return payload;},getPostsFailure:function getPostsFailure(err){return err;}});export var showModal=createAction('SHOW_CREATE_POST_MODAL');export var hideModal=createAction('HIDE_CREATE_POST_MODAL');
